scripts.graph:compile:local: rm -rf src/generated/local && mkdir src/generated/local && yarn graph:prepare:local && graph codegen --output-dir src/generated/local src/generated/local/subgraph.yaml && graph build src/generated/local/subgraph.yaml --output-dir src/generated/local/build
scripts.graph:compile:ropsten: rm -rf src/generated/ropsten && mkdir src/generated/ropsten && yarn graph:prepare:ropsten && graph codegen --output-dir src/generated/ropsten src/generated/ropsten/subgraph.yaml && graph build src/generated/ropsten/subgraph.yaml --output-dir src/generated/ropsten/build
scripts.graph:deploy:ropsten: yarn graph:compile:ropsten &&  graph auth https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ 92c86fdaab064b86baa7721f2c32bcff && graph deploy   --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ nugglabs/nuggftropsten  src/generated/ropsten/subgraph.yaml
